item.description:
Let's Get out and Enjoy a Saturday night!
Perro Salado - Dinner & Drinks
February 13, 2010 - 6:30 PM.

What better way to enjoy a Saturday night than having food & drinks with new/old friends?

A Modern Mexican Restaurant in the Heart of Newport known for their Cuisine, Margaritas, and Sangria... check it out @ perrosalado.com

With a table reservation - upstairs - please be on time, arrive hungry and thirsty.

Reservation under name (Sue or Meetup)

Email: elri726@hotmail.com if you have any questions.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation is on second floor - 1st room to the right - Sue will be greeting.
item.name: Let's Get Out and Enjoy Saturday Night -Perro Salado Dinner/Drinks
